string-array.name: sights_1
string-array.item: Take the trail behind City Hall or head out on Lighthoue Rd.
Head out for a bluff trail or meander into the beach cove

string-array.name: sights_2
string-array.item: Access via Stonesboro Road in Manchester

string-array.name: sights_3
string-array.item: Arena Cove & Point Arena City Pier
Boat launch, hot showers, fishing, recycling drop-off.

string-array.name: sights_4
string-array.item: Bluff trails showcase a forsest of Bishops pines & our stunning white cliffs.

string-array.name: sights_5
string-array.item: It is named for the spherical sandstone concretions found there at low tide.
